content: {"hypothesis": "Objects in the input grid are propagated in the vertical direction, extending from their original positions both upwards and downwards till they hit another object or the boundary of the grid.", "sub_hypotheses": ["Level 1: Each object expands in both upward and downward direction from its initial position until it encounters another object or touches the grid boundary.", "Level 2: As a group, the objects collectively expand maintaining their initial relative positions to form a unique pattern in the grid.", "Level 3: The entire grid ultimately shows a vertically elongated or stretched version of the original pattern of objects in the input grid."]}
